mapper.select: SELECT hotel_id hotelId, hotel_name hotelName,dest_id destId, address, point, star, image_num imageNum, description simpleDesc, can_book canBook FROM info WHERE hotel_id=#{hotelId}
SELECT hotel_id hotelId, p_title pTitle, p_desc pDesc FROM policies WHERE hotel_id=#{hotelId}

SELECT rooms.room_index AS roomIndex, rooms.room_name AS roomName, rooms.description, rooms.capacity, rooms.price, rooms.room_num - COALESCE(X.num, 0) AS roomNum, rooms.people_num AS peopleNum FROM rooms LEFT JOIN (SELECT room_index,COUNT(*) AS num FROM booking WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND ( check_in_date <= #{dateIn} OR check_out_date >= #{dateOut} ) GROUP BY room_index) X ON rooms.room_index = X.room_index WHERE rooms.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND rooms.people_num >= #{peopleNum} AND (X.num IS NULL OR rooms.room_num - X.num > 0)
